actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A Bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate an inequity in computing annuities of Federal law enforcement officers or firefighters.

summary.text: Stipulates that the annuity of a Federal employee retiring with at least five years but less than 20 years of service as a law enforcement officer or firefighter, or any combination thereof, shall be computed by multiplying 2 1/2 percent of such employee's average pay by the years of service as a law enforcement officer or firefighter.

titles.title: A Bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate an inequity in computing annuities of Federal law enforcement officers or firefighters.
